name: react-code-viewer
description: Simple no-frills code viewer with syntax highlighting

scripts.build: babel src --out-dir lib --ignore '**/__tests__/**' && flow-copy-source -i '**/__tests__/**' src lib
scripts.deploy: git checkout -b gh-pages && rm -rf dist/ && parcel build example/App.js && git add -f dist/ && git commit -m 'Publish website' && git push -fu origin gh-pages && git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages

author: Joydip Roy <joydipand@gmail.com> (https://github.com/rjoydip)
